tool_description: Generates descriptive alternative text based on content analysis, following accessibility best practices and user-specified requirements.

content_analysis.description: Structured content analysis from image/chart analysis tools

purpose.description: Purpose of the content: decorative, informative, functional, complex

target_audience.description: Target audience: general, technical, educational, marketing

max_length.description: Maximum character length for the alt text (50-250)

include_emotions.description: Whether to include emotional or subjective descriptions

context_info.description: Additional context about where the content appears

error_messages: Invalid content analysis: Provide valid structured content analysis data.
Invalid purpose: Use one of [decorative, informative, functional, complex].
Invalid target audience: Use one of [general, technical, educational, marketing].
Invalid max_length: Length must be between 50 and 250 characters.
Insufficient content data: Content analysis must contain enough information to generate meaningful alt text.
usage: Provide content_analysis and purpose, optionally specify target_audience, max_length, include_emotions, and context_info. The tool generates appropriate alternative text following accessibility guidelines.

character_count.description: Number of characters in the generated alt text

description_type.description: Type of description generated based on purpose

key_elements_included.description: List of content elements included in the description
